SEARCH
Package tetris.tetrominoes

Class Tetromino

java.lang.Object
tetris.tetrominoes.Tetromino
Direct Known Subclasses:
ITetromino, JTetromino, LTetromino, OTetromino, STetromino, TetrominoShadow, TTetromino, ZTetromino
public abstract class Tetromino extends Object
Abstract base class representing a Tetris piece (Tetromino).

This class manages the state common to all pieces:

  • Position: Logic coordinates (grid row/col) and display offsets.
  • Rotation: Current orientation index (0-3).
  • Shape: A 3D array defining the boolean grid for every possible rotation.
  • Appearance: Color and rendering logic.

  • Field Details

    • NUMBER_OF_TETROMINOES

      public static final int NUMBER_OF_TETROMINOES
      Total number of unique tetromino shapes (7).

    • rotationIndex

      protected int rotationIndex
      Current rotation state (0 = 0 deg, 1 = 90 deg, 2 = 180 deg, 3 = 270 deg).

  • Constructor Details

    • Tetromino

      public Tetromino(boolean[][][] shapeRotations, int rotationIndex, double x, double y, Color color, int parentX, int parentY)
      Constructs a new Tetromino.
      Parameters:
      shapeRotations - 3D array defining the occupied cells for each of the 4 rotations.
      rotationIndex - Initial rotation state.
      x - Initial logical X coordinate.
      y - Initial logical Y coordinate.
      color - The color of the blocks.
      parentX - Screen X offset of the parent container.
      parentY - Screen Y offset of the parent container.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public abstract TetrominoType getType()
      Gets the enum type of this tetromino.
      Returns:
      The specific TetrominoType.

    • getWidth

      public abstract int getWidth()
      Gets the full width of the bounding box matrix (e.g., 4 for 'I', 3 for 'T').
      Returns:
      The matrix width.

    • getHeight

      public abstract int getHeight()
      Gets the full height of the bounding box matrix.
      Returns:
      The matrix height.

    • getApparentWidth

      public abstract int getApparentWidth()
      Gets the visual width of the piece in its current rotation.

      Unlike getWidth(), which returns the matrix size, this returns the actual width of the filled blocks. Used for centering in the Next/Hold queues.

      Returns:
      The apparent width in cells.

    • getApparentHeight

      public abstract int getApparentHeight()
      Gets the visual height of the piece in its current rotation.
      Returns:
      The apparent height in cells.

    • createCopy

      public abstract Tetromino createCopy()
      Creates a deep copy of this tetromino. Essential for physics simulations (ghost pieces, collision testing).
      Returns:
      A new instance with the same state.

    • getShapeRotations

      public boolean[][][] getShapeRotations()
      Gets the 3D array defining all rotation states.
      Returns:
      The shape definitions.

    • getShape

      public boolean[][] getShape()
      Gets the 2D grid representing the piece's current rotation.
      Returns:
      A boolean matrix where true represents a block.

    • getRotationIndex

      public int getRotationIndex()
      Gets the current rotation index (0-3).

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Renders the Tetromino to the graphics context.

      Thread Safety: This method is synchronized to ensure that the position and rotation index do not change mid-render, which could result in tearing or drawing the piece in an invalid state.

      Parameters:
      g2 - The Graphics2D context.
